paragraphs: You won't get an off-the-shelf SME website from us, but a sound investment in your digital future. Transparency is the basis of our partnership.
Efficient starter solutions: Our web design packages start at CHF 4,500 for start-ups and clear projects that require fast and professional implementation.
Individual, strategic web design: For comprehensive projects that require an in-depth strategy, a unique design and individual functions, investments start at CHF 10,000.
You will receive a clear fixed price offer from us for every project. This gives you full cost control and planning security right from the start.

Our process is designed for efficiency and the highest quality. We realize most website projects within 8 to 10 weeks from strategic kick-off to go-live. But if it has to be done quickly, we can also do it in 7 days.

For you, this means that we don't invest our energy in endless technical setups, but rather, thanks to the smart use of Squarespace, directly in what counts: Your strategy, your message and your design. The key to rapid progress lies in your decisiveness and our proven, clear process.
Absolutely. A clear message is at the heart of every successful SME homepage. If you don't have the words, we'll step in.

You provide us with your expert knowledge in the form of keywords and conversations. We transform this essence into SEO-optimized content that not only informs your target group, but also convinces them. This is a central part of our website consulting.
The visual design is crucial for the first impression and the emotional impact of your successful company website. Here, too, we won't leave you on your own.
Together we will find the perfect solution for you:
AI-supported visual worlds: We create unique and consistent visual worlds that visually emphasize your uniqueness.
Professional photography: We connect you with experienced photographers from our network.
Curated stock images: We research and license high-quality images that fit your brand.
The launch of your new KMI website is a clearly defined and collaborative process for us. We leave nothing to chance so that we not only achieve your goals, but exceed them.
This is how we lay the foundation for your success together:

The strategic first meetingIt all starts with us listening to you. In an initial meeting, we want to understand your vision, your business goals and the needs of your customers. This is the basis for everything else.

The customized digital offer: Instead of a rigid PDF, you will receive an interactive, digital offer from us. Here you can dynamically select various options and modules and see transparently how your decisions affect the overall investment. We discuss this offer together to put together the perfect package for you.

Kick-off & preparation workshop: After your confirmation, we officially start with a kick-off meeting. This is immediately followed by the most important part: the joint preparation workshop. This is where we dive deep into the details, define the user journey, sharpen the core messages and lay the strategic foundation for the entire project.
For you, this means a transparent, comprehensible process in which you are actively involved from the outset and have the certainty that your project is based on a solid, strategic foundation.

We do not simply develop new company websites - we create the digital foundation for your success. As your Swiss web design agency in Zurich, we design and realize digital experiences that achieve your goals.
These include:
Comprehensive company websites: That strengthen your brand and get to the heart of your expertise.
Strategic landing pages: Lead visitors to a specific action and support your campaigns.
Multilingual portalsTo reach your target groups across language borders.
Modern portfolio pages: Presenting your work in an impressive way.
We develop new websites for you with the CMS system that best suits your requirements, whether Squarespace, WordPress or Shopify.
We are your strategic partner. That's why we'll tell you honestly if an idea doesn't work and suggest a better way instead.
We rely on technology that gives you freedom. If Squarespace fulfills your requirements, we as a Squarespace agency and experts use the platform for strategic reasons that directly benefit you:
Focus on design & strategy: Squarespace gives us as web designers the freedom to cast your uniqueness into an impressive web design without getting lost in technical details.
Simple administration for you: After the launch, you can easily and intuitively manage content such as texts, images or blog articles yourself - without any code.

Security and maintenance-free: No constant plug-in updates, no closed doors for maintenance work. The platform is secure, stable and always up-to-date. So you can concentrate fully on your core business.
Strong SEO foundation: Squarespace offers an excellent technical basis for search engine optimization out of the box. We take care of the rest with strategically prepared content.

Yes, this is one of our core competencies. Many of our customers come to us to upgrade their outdated or difficult-to-use SME website (e.g. from WordPress, Typo3 or Squarespace 7.0) to a modern and easy-to-maintain platform.

As an experienced Swiss web design agency in D√ºbendorf, Zurich, we analyze your existing site, plan the move strategically and ensure a seamless transition - so that your SEO rankings are maintained and your digital presence is strengthened.
